title: Luxury Kit #2 - Natural Detox Box - NABILA K
description: Detox your skin with custom curated luxury beauty box. Rejuvenate, renew and refresh with Nabila K.
cleaned_text: Organic Kelp Face Polish Cane Sugar, Dead Sea Salt, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract (Aloe Vera Gel), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Organic Kelp Powder, Indica (Argan Oil), Ricinodendron Rautanenii Oil & Sorbic Acid (natural preservative). Argan Oil Hibiscus Hibiscus Sabdariffa (Hibiscus Seed Oil), Rose Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract (Aloe Vera), Calendula Officinalis Glycerin, Sorbic Acid (natural preservative), Vitamin E and Organic Roses. Vanilla Bean Glycerin Soap Ingredients: Vanilla, 100% Sorbitol, Oleate, Soybean Protein and a of Herbs, Botanicals, and Essential Oils and/or Essences. Acai Lip Balm Organic Cocos Nucifera (Coconut Oil), Organic Beeswax, Organic Ricinus Communis (Castor Seed Oil), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Oil), 100% natural flavor oil.
